CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL(Job_Completed_Infoi__c ,"Green -> Done") , IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0152000000146yQ", "Green", 17,17), IF( ISPICKVAL(Job_Completed_Infoi__c ,"White -> Not Applicable"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0152000000146yV", "Black", 17,17),
IF( ISBLANK(TEXT(Job_Completed_Infoi__c)), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0152000000146yL", "Red", 17,17),
IF( ISPICKVAL(Job_Completed_Infoi__c ,"Red -> Not Yet Done"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0152000000146yL", "Red", 17,17), null) )))
CustomField.label: Job Completed / Info Updated
